briefdescription.para: Brief.
Creates a new process into the system and sets it ready to run. The process will be created in unatomic mode(preemptive mode) and with tty -1.

parameterdescription.para: The process' name
The process' main function. Must Not Be NULL.
A pointer to an argument list.
FOREGROUND or BACKGROUND.

simplesect.para: The new process' pid or -1 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: This function terminates the calling process and status is returned to whom is waiting for the calling process to exit.

parameterdescription.para: The process' exit status.

briefdescription.para: Sets the given process tty id.

detaileddescription.para:
pid
The process' pid whose tty id will be set.
tty
The tty id to be set.
0 on success, -1 on error. Use:

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the given process pid's tty.

parameterdescription.para: The pid of the process.

briefdescription.para: Sets the given tty focused process with the given pid process.

parameterdescription.para: The process to be set as focused process.
The tty whose focused process will be set.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the given tty focused process pid.

parameterdescription.para: The tty id.

simplesect.para: The pid of the tty focused process.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the calling process' pid.
Retrieves the calling process' parent pid.
Blocks the calling process until a child returns.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer where to store the return state of the child process.

simplesect.para: Returns the pid of the child process that recently returned.

briefdescription.para: This function blocks the calling process until the given pid child returns.

parameterdescription.para: The pid of the child process to wait.
A pointer where to store the child process return status.

simplesect.para: The pid of the child process.

briefdescription.para: Kills the given pid process.

parameterdescription.para: The pid of the process to be killed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the tty mode of the given pid process.

parameterdescription.para: The pid of the process whose tty mode will be changed.
The tty mode: TTY_CANONICAL or TTY_RAW.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the given pid process tty mode.

parameterdescription.para: The pid of the process whose tty mode will be retrieved.

briefdescription.para: Sets the calling process level.

parameterdescription.para: FOREGROUND or BACKGROUND.

simplesect.para: TRUE on success, FALSE on error.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the calling process' level.
Retrieves the calling process' priority.
Sets the pid process priority.

parameterdescription.para: The pid of the process whose priority will be changed.
The priority to be set.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the amount of miliseconds that the calling process' had the processor.

simplesect.para: The amount of miliseconds that the calling process' had the processor.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the amount of ticks since the system boot.

simplesect.para: The amount of ticks since the system boot.

briefdescription.para: Sets the given pid process' atomicity.

parameterdescription.para: The pid of the process whose atomicity will be set.
ATOMIC or UNATOMIC.

briefdescription.para: All the process functions that invoke syscalls.

simplesect.para: Luciano Zemin, Nicols Magni, Nicols Purita
